title: Chandrika Polki Necklace Set with Ruby and Pearls
materials: Seed Pearls. Crafted with Hyderabadi Kundan setting techniques.
features: This exquisite necklace set features a floral Polki pendant, cascading into a triangular design with a central Ruby. Three pearl strands are suspended below, each ending with a faceted pink tourmaline. The intricate Kundan setting highlights the brilliance of the uncut diamonds, reflecting the timeless elegance of Telugu craftsmanship. The design incorporates a contemporary touch with the tourmaline drops.
colors: Red/Pink (Ruby and Tourmaline). A classic South Indian color palette symbolizing prosperity and auspiciousness.
occasions: or any grand occasion where traditional elegance is desired. Also suitable for upscale modern events where a touch of cultural heritage is appreciated.
description: This Polki necklace set is a true heirloom piece, representing the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad and South India. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and natural gemstones ensures its lasting value. The unique design blends traditional Kundan craftsmanship with contemporary aesthetics, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection. Its timeless appeal and exquisite craftsmanship make it a cherished possession for generations to come.
